00022 #include "nuts_bolts.h"
00023 #include <stdint.h>
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include <util/delay.h>
00026 
00027 int read_double(char *line, uint8_t *char_counter, double *double_ptr)                  
00028 {
00029   char *start = line + *char_counter;
00030   char *end;
00031   
00032   *double_ptr = strtod(start, &end);
00033   if(end == start) { 
00034     return(false); 
00035   };
00036 
00037   *char_counter = end - line;
00038   return(true);
00039 }
00040 
00041 // Delays variable defined milliseconds. Compiler compatibility fix for _delay_ms(),
00042 // which only accepts constants in future compiler releases.
00043 void delay_ms(uint16_t ms) 
00044 {
00045   while ( ms-- ) { _delay_ms(1); }
00046 }
00047 
00048 // Delays variable defined microseconds. Compiler compatibility fix for _delay_us(),
00049 // which only accepts constants in future compiler releases.
00050 /// LETARTARE   uint16_t -> uint32_t
00051 void delay_us(uint32_t us) 
00052 {
00053   while (us) {
00054 if (us < 10) { 
00055 _delay_us(1);
00056 us--;
00057 } else if (us < 100) {
00058 _delay_us(10);
00059 us -= 10;
00060 } else if (us < 1000) {
00061 _delay_us(100);
00062 us -= 100;
00063 } else {
00064 _delay_ms(1);
00065 us -= 1000;
00066 }
00067 }
00068 }
